Purpose: To detect and quantify Anti-Glial/Neuronal Nuclear Antibody-Type 1 in cerebrospinal fluid for diagnosing immune-related neurological diseases.
Container: Sterile leak-proof tube for cerebrospinal fluid
Equipment: Centrifuge; pipettes and tips; automated or manual immunofluorescence assay platform; fluorescence microscope; incubator set to 37 Â°C
